# ðŸš€ Chat Completion REST API

All the AI services are implemented using REST APIs so fundementalldd you need to understand how to send the requests and what the response body will be.

Here is the link to the [Azure OpenAI Service REST API reference](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/reference#chat-completions).

## ðŸ”–How to send a prompt to the Completion Endpoint

In order to send a prompt to the completion endpoint you need to understand if it will be POST, GET, PUT etc.

For the completion endpoint you well be sending a POST request that looks like this:

```
POST https://{your-resource-name}.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/{deployment-id}/chat/completions?api-version={api-version}

 ```

```
https://rdc-azure-openai.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/rdc-OpenAI-Demo-deployment/extensions/chat/completions?api-version=2023-08-01-preview

 ```

#### **Step 1: Collect the model details**

For example, using the example above, I would pull these details from Azure.

{your-resource-name} = rdc-north-ai-demo

{deployment-id} = rdc-gpt-16-north

{api-version} = 2024-02-15-preview

Using these details, our POST request would look like this:

```
POST https://rdc-north-ai-demo.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/rdc-gpt-16-north/chat/completions?api-version=2024-02-15-preview

 ```

#### **Step 2: Build the POST request, with api-key and request body**

**Create the necesscary headers:**

> Content-Type: application/json  
api-key: YOUR_API_KEY 
  

**Create the request body:**

```
{"messages":[
  {"role": "system", "content": "You are a helpful assistant, you name is Bob."},
  {"role": "user", "content": "Why is the sky blue?"}     
  ]}

 ```

#### **Step 2: Combinding all these datails send the POST request**

Example **curl** command:

```
curl https://YOUR_RESOURCE_NAME.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/YOUR_DEPLOYMENT_NAME/chat/completions?api-version=2024-02-01 \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "api-key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -d '{"messages":[{"role": "system", "content": "You are a helpful assistant, you name is Bob."},{"role": "user", "content": "Why is the sky blue?"}]}'

 ```
